Rate content is the information about prices or costs that a company collects and stores electronically. This can include things like hourly rates, fees for services, prices per unit, or discounts from suppliers. Companies use this rate content in their electronic systems to help manage purchases, check that invoices match agreed prices, and make sure they pay the right amount. It helps automate and simplify buying and billing processes by having all the pricing details organized and easy to access.
You can contact us at support@dvcompany.com or call us at 9988776655.
